title: attack-pattern
description: An Attack Pattern is a mechanism for describing and documenting how an attack against one or more targets may be executed.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `attack-pattern`.

name.description: The name used to identify the Attack Pattern.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Attack Pattern, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

kill_chain_phases.description: The list of kill chain phases for which this attack pattern is used.
